snippet: The intense battle in Kikla, southwest of the capital, Tripoli, also left 43 people wounded, mainly from shrapnel wounds, a hospital officials said.
lead_paragraph: The intense battle in Kikla, southwest of the capital, Tripoli, also left 43 people wounded, mainly from shrapnel wounds, a hospital officials said.

headline.main: 23 Killed in Libya as Islamist Militants Battle Rival Militias
